comments.html:
Hi Ivan, thanks for your insights. I'd like to add NetYCE to the mix. These are the typical cases in which they excel.

They would fall into your 2nd bullet. Though they provide it as a service as well.

You might want to take a look at it.

Cheers, Bart
comments.name: Bart Dorlandt
